Uses of Class
arma.Mat

    • Uses of Mat in arma

      Methods in arma that return Mat 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Mat Arma.abs(Mat matrix)
      Creates a new matrix with the absolute value for all elements of the provides matrix.
      Mat Mat.col(int j)
      Return a copy of the jth column as a (n_rows, 1) matrix.
      Mat Mat.diag()
      Returns a copy of the main diagonal as a (Math.min(n_rows, n_cols), 1) matrix.

      Creates a new matrix being the quotient of a right-hand side (element-wise) division with the provided divisor.

      Creates a new matrix being the quotient of a right-hand side matrix division with the provided divisor.
      Mat Mat.elem(Mat selection)
      Returns a copy of all elements for which selection.at(n) > 0 holds as a (Arma.accu( Arma.find(selection, Op.STRICT_GREATER, 0)), 1) matrix.
